start.text: Morning. I heard something on the rocks last night. Sounded small, maybe hurt. Would you go look? Take the path toward the tall grass, but be careful.

searching.text: Find anything yet? The path leads to the tall grass. Something's out there, I'm certain.

metCreature.text: You're back. What did you find? ...I see. Well, you've got a friend now. That's something. The fisherman in the village might have work if you need coin.

working.text: The fisherman treats you fair? Good. Storm's coming soon—I'd estimate three days, maybe four. We'll need supplies.

boatReady.text: Almost ready. Just need a few more things. The compass from the shop would help—my eyes aren't what they were.

fisherman.name: Old Fisherman
fisherman.dialog: Ahoy there! I've got work if you're interested. I'll pay good coin for help with my catch.
